import styles from "./DoubtPosting.module.css"; const DoubtPosting = () => { const postDoubt = async (uID, rID, dTitle, dBody=null, dImglink=null,) => { let config = getToken(); let d = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); let t = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(); config.method = "POST"; config.body = JSON.stringify({ userID: uID, roomID: rID, title: dTitle, date: d, time: t, body: dBody, imglink: dImglink }); let url = "http://localhost:5000/api/doubts/"; await fetch(url, config); } return (
